item.title: Model ints error rep++
item.dc:creator: @sergiypro sergiypro
item.description:
@sergiypro wrote:

case 13993: itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.modelid = 37007; itemDef.modelZoom = 2128; itemDef.modelRotationY = 504; itemDef.modelRotationX = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 1; itemDef.anInt204 = 0; itemDef.anInt175 = -1; itemDef.anInt197 = -1; itemDef.anInt165 = 37003; //wear itemDef.anInt200 = 37003; //wear itemDef.name = "Gold Donator Cape"; itemDef.description = "Donor Cape"; break;

whats wrong?

the character model has priority over the cape so the cape shows second.
